Date: Sun, 11 Feb 2001 15:37:18 -0700
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Becoming a Destron
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

As Megatron flew he thought to himself, he had a lot to go over, his new
master, his destiny. Yet I am trapped, for the first time in Millions of
years have been outsmarted. This Galvatron has evolved to become cool and
calculating. He was not the same that left the Decepticon Empire in ruin in
the year 2007. There is much I dont know, and I acted rather rashly
earlier. I should learn about my enemy before I challenge him. And if I do
defeat him, what of the Decepticon empire. Is there anything left for me to
rebuild. Was my dream that easily crushed. "Arggggg" he screamed as he
pulled his hand back and thrust it forward, releasing a torent of nuclear
energy from it. The blast bore into a mountain side, wiping out the base of
it. With no support, the mountain began to crumble. "No, I am the Mighty
Megatron, the Decepticons cannot be stopped, I will escape Galvatrons
control, and find someone to follow me" he screamed to no one in
perticular. He then started to near the Destron base, he opened a commlink,
"Magmatron, it is Megatron, demanding permission to enter" he then looked
downcast and his face erupted in a sneer, "as youre subordinate".
